p: The major constituents in Momordica caranthia were epicatechin (555.22 mg kg −1), catechin (201.78 mg kg −1) and the two triterpenes oleanolic acid (238.10 mg kg −1) and ursolic acid (195.44 mg kg −1). The main metabolite of Cucumis metuliferus was catechin (928.74 mg kg −1), while Benincasa hispida was rich in gallic acid (525.24 mg kg −1) which is the main constituent.
